title: Trinidad and Tobago - Credit Rating
description: Standard & Poor's credit rating for Trinidad and Tobago stands at BBB- with stable outlook. Moody's credit rating for Trinidad and Tobago was last set at Ba2 with stable outlook. In general, a credit rating is used by sovereign wealth funds, pension funds and other investors to gauge the credit worthiness of Trinidad and Tobago thus having a big impact on the country's borrowing costs. This page includes the government debt credit rating for Trinidad and Tobago as reported by major credit rating agencies.
